name: The Princess And The Frog (Blu-ray + DVD) (Widescreen)

reviews.name: The Princess And The Frog (Blu-ray + DVD) (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: I like this package because it came with 3 different disks. All three are great, the price was wonderful. I think that they should bundle more movies like this.
reviews.title: 01 April 2010

reviews.name: The Princess And The Frog (Blu-ray + DVD) (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText:
Disney has finally returned to good classic 2-D animation with "The Princess and the Frog." The heroine is spunky a-la Belle, Pocahontas, or Mulan. The hero is more than a pretty face. The villain is actually evil. Adults and children with both like this movie.

The combo pack is ideal for those who have or do not have a blu-ray player. There are actually decent special features on the DVD.
reviews.title: Great Movie

reviews.name: The Princess And The Frog (Blu-ray + DVD) (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: I was going on a car trip to Disneyland with the kids and thought I would not get this DVD on time for the trip.Then there it was in my mailbox!! Quick great service and the kids love that movie.
reviews.title: Princess And The Frog (Blu-ray + Standard DVD + Di

reviews.name: The Princess And The Frog (Blu-ray + DVD) (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: Both my grandchildren loved this movie when they opened it at Christmas! They are age 3 years, 4 months and 19 months. A couple parts were kind of scary but they were locked in at the t.v. and watched the entire movie!
reviews.title: Great movie for the grandkids!

reviews.name: The Princess And The Frog (Blu-ray + DVD) (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: This is a great movie and so nice to be able to have the Blu-ray, DVD, and Digital copies.
reviews.title: So funny
